casebody.data:
HELSIUS
v.
ROBERTSON & COUNTY OF DURHAM. No. 698P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Robert D. McClanahan, Durham, for Jonathon Helsius.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of March 2006 by Respondent (County of Durham) for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
